name: The Feast
storyline:
When your mother invites you to a family meal, you don’t expect it will be a grotesque and painful event the moment it starts.

The Feast is an invitation to a bizarre family dinner party that takes an unexpected turn. Join the most surreal meal of your life, discover what you truly stand for, and create your own tragic spectacle in this short thought-inspiring and unforgettable adventure with multiple endings.
summary:
The Feast is a short and intensely dramatic experience designed to be completed in one sitting (20-30 minutes).

This dark and peculiar spectacle grants you the lead role. In a theatrical setting, survive the utterly confusing and twisted dinner. You will be observed and judged, so face reality, weigh every action, consider possible outcomes, make choices - and define the conclusion of this life-changing celebration.

After all, what happens here is not your problem…
… or is it?
